resources.string: It is important that you record the following backup phrase in case you have to recover your wallet for any reason
Word must be entered in the same order as they were shown in the backup
Your account info is copied successfully"
A new fingerprint was added to this device, so your password is required.
PLEASE CONFIRM THAT THE PROVIDED NAME MATCHES ACCOUNT ADDRESS
